english.segment1: Ready or not. Change is comin'. Can you feel the spirit rising in you. Has it been a while. Since you felt the fire and passion and joy anew
english.segment2: Are you ready for a revelation. We all know that there is so much more. We're in need of this inspiration. Can't wait another day. I gotta have it right away
english.segment3: *chorus*. Revive us again. Revive us again. Restore the joy of our salvation. Revive us again. Revive us again. Renew life within. Revive us again
english.segment4: Love is alive and exciting. If we only let it take control. Drink from the fountain. It's so inviting. It will strengthen and refresh us all
english.segment5: Nothing can stop this revolution. When we're determined to see it through. If we believe that there is one solution. You know his name is Jesus. He is the one to free us
english.segment7: You know we need you to revive us. and not just speak it. Let is just go on and on. and never come to an end. (2x)
english.segment8: Are you ready for a revelation. We all know that there is so much more. We're in need of this inspiration. Can't wait another day. I gotta have it right away
english.segment10: You know we need you to revive us. and not just speak it. Let is just go on and on. and never come to an end. (2x)
